long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cave Blast is an exhilarating game available as a Chrome Extension and can also be played for free on the website https://ironsnout.org/. Prepare for an action-packed adventure as you navigate through treacherous caves and engage in intense battles.

In "Cave Blast," developed by SnoutUp Games, you find yourself in a dangerous underground world filled with enemies and obstacles. Your mission is to survive the relentless onslaught and blast your way through the caves using an arsenal of powerful weapons.
In the media files, keyboard shortcuts have been provided to play the game, whereas in real time we need a joystick to play and control the gaming functionality
Note:We have added "More Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://ironsnout.org/
